cmput301w14t13.project.models
Class CommentTree

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.models.ViewList<UpdateInterface>
      cmput301w14t13.project.models.CommentTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncProcess
public class CommentTree
extends ViewList<UpdateInterface>
implements AsyncProcess

The model for the entire app to modify. It holds the root which contains the list of topics, a comment list which displays every comment made in a topic, the user's global username, a number which is used to grab topics from root, and adapters for updating the lists.

Author:
arweber

Method Detail

getInstance

public static CommentTree getInstance()
Singleton for our model. Use this when you need access to the methods within CommentTree that will modify the model of the app such as adding topics and comments.

Returns:
the instance of the model

setCurrentUsername

public void setCurrentUsername(java.lang.String username)
Sets the global username to be used throughout the app. With this set, topics and comments will automatically have their username field set to this name unless changed during the creation of the topic or comment. This username is set in SelectUsernameController by the user.

Parameters:
username - the username that you would like to use globally throughout the app

getCurrentUsername

public java.lang.String getCurrentUsername()
Used during creation of a topic or comment to automatically set the EditText field to the global username.

Returns:
the global username being used currently

getCommentList

public java.util.ArrayList<CommentTreeElement> getCommentList(RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable)
Gets the comment list of the current topic being viewed so it can be displayed to the user. This is obtained in TopicView

Parameters:
updateable - The current topic view being viewed. This view is then used to obtain its respective list of comments
Returns:
the topic's list of comments to be displayed to the user in TopicView

getChildren

public java.util.ArrayList<CommentTreeElement> getChildren(RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable)
Gets the topics to be displayed to the user. The list of topics are only displayed in HomeView, so only a HomeView should be passed in here.

Parameters:
updateable - the HomeView where the topics are to be displayed
Returns:
The list of topics to be displayed

addSortedList

public void addSortedList(RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable,
                          java.util.ArrayList<CommentTreeElement> sortedList)
This sets the current list of topics to the sorted list being passed in. The reason for this is so the topics are still in sorted order after leaving HomeView, such as when viewing a topic and then returning.

Parameters:
updateable - The view whose children are to be set to be sortedList
sortedList - The sorted list to set the children of HomeView to

update

public void update(RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable)
updates the commentList to be displayed in a topic. For each topic child, it gets the children all the way down and adds them to the comment list.

updateTop

public void updateTop()

fillTopicChildren

public void fillTopicChildren(CommentTreeElement comment,
                              RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable)
This function takes in a topic child and then recursively goes down the child comment trees to fill a list containing every comment that can then be displayed. It first gets the children of this comment and adds the comment that was last passed into the function. If the comment has children then it recursively calls itself to add them. If a comment has no children then it doesn't do anything more and moves on to the next comment.

Parameters:
comment - the comment whose children are being added

fillTopicChildren

public void fillTopicChildren(CommentTreeElement comment,
                              int rank)

updateCommentList

public void updateCommentList(RankedHierarchicalActivity updateable)
Updates the comment list of the TopicView being currently viewed. This is done to update any changes to the commentList immediately

Parameters:
updateable - The view whose comment list is to be updated

refresh

public void refresh()
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Refreshes the HomeView or TopicView depending on whether or not there is a detected internet connection. If there is an internet connection then the topics will be pulled from the server and update with the latest changes. If there is no connection then the user will be switched to an offline mode where they can view anything they have looked at before their disconnection. Anything they look at is cached locally.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

popFromCommentStack

java.lang.InterruptedException
